title: DDFP 503: Week 9 Red Challenge Flag picks 'Menu' & Best Game 7 wins
itunes:title: DDFP 503: Week 9 Red Challenge Flag picks 'Menu' & Best Game 7 wins
description:
Shek is joined by Matt Harmon, Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss which teams are doomed if they lose this weekend, the best mustaches on NFL mascots and the best championship wins in the past 40 years. Also, the fellas and Cynthia read some new "Dad Jokes" and talk about what they are watching on TV this weekend. Plus, EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into British restaurant, "The Royal 66 Pub" and the crew reviews an entire menu of appetizers, main courses and desserts describing the biggest Week 9 games in this special edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
